channel.title: Google on @JvmName("Parth")

item.title: A Tale of Two Pixels
item.description: Preamble Every developer likes new shiny things, and I’m no exception – so when Google leaked announced a new phone with custom in-house silicon, an in-screen fingerprint reader, and other goodies, I looked past the hefty 6-inch screen and ordered one. That New Phone Smell first phone arrives Wed, Oct 27 (despite peoples’ fedex woes) I unbox Oct 31 i migrate everything, set up a fingerprint…and the phone screen starts flashing on-and-off after ~5 seconds, the OS crashes, restarts, lands on the lock screen, and continues this isn’t a true “bootloop”, but it’s pretty damn close i think to myself “huh, that’s odd”; I factory reset, setup again, and the same thing happens Nov 1
